lead_paragraph: The San Jose Sharks will be without top-line forward Tomas Hertl for Game 3 of the Stanley Cup Final.

headline.print_headline: Sharks F Tomas Hertl to Miss Game 3 With Lower-Body Injury
headline.main: Sharks F Tomas Hertl to Miss Game 3 With Lower-Body Injury
